channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Confluence Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Confluence Server

item.title: CVE-2020-36290|2024-10-03T18:36:30.272Z -- atlassian -- confluence%20server
item.description: The Livesearch macro in Confluence Server and Data Center before version 7.4.5, from version 7.5.0 before 7.6.3, and from version 7.7.0 before version 7.7.4 allows remote attackers with permission to edit a page or blog to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the page excerpt functionality.
